Powers -- Male Avion Medieval Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d12 Vigor: d8
Skills (17 Points):
Boating: (agi) d10 Knowledge (History): (sma) d4 Swimming: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Psionics: (sma) d6 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Investigation: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -2 Persuasion/-2 Streetwise
Mean: -2 Charisma
Arcane Background (Magic): 1 on Spellcasting inflicts Shaken
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 16; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (9 points): Arcane Background (Magic): 1; New Power: 4; Power Points: 4 Hindrances: Mean; Vow; Wanted+ Avion Features: Flight; Hollow-Boned; Mostly Human
Feature Notes:
Mostly Human: +1 Edge Points
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Wanted+: Has significant trouble with local law enforcement
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Battle Axe (d12+d8); Great Sword (d12+d10); Long Sword (d12+d8); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Hollow-Boned: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Flight: Fly Pace 6
Great Sword Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 30
Powers:
Armor: (2 PP) RTouch Gives +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 3 rd
Banish: (3 PP) R8" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 wound), returns to native plane if incapacitated (Spirit neg)
Barrier: (1/Section PP) R8" Creates sections of 1" high wall for PP rd
Beast Friend: (3+2xSize PP) R400" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min
Blast: (2 PP) R24" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage
Blind: (2 PP) R12" Target Shaken and suffers -2 on Parry (Agility-2 neg, 1 on die also suffers -6 trait tests) for 1 rd
Bolt: (1/missile PP) R12" Inflicts 2d6 damage
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R8" Target gains +1 trait step or suffers -1 trait step (Raise +2 or -2 (Spirit neg)) for 3 rd
Burrow: (3 PP) RSelf Allows target to merge into earth for 3 rd
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d10 damage (Agility neg)
Confusion: (1 PP) R16" Target suffers Shaken (Smarts-2 neg)
Damage Field: (4 PP) RTouch Target touch inflicts 2d6 (Raise 2d8) damage for 3 rd
Darksight: (1 PP) RTouch Target halves illumination penalties (Raise 6 pts) for 1 hr
Deflection: (2 PP) RTouch Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 3 rd
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) RSight Target can detect supernatural effects for 3 rd or conceals target aura for 1 hr (Detect neg)
Disguise: (3 PP) RTouch Target assumes another's appearance for 10 min
Dispel: (3 PP) R8" Ends targeted power (Arcane skill neg, +2 if types differ)
Divination: (5 PP) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information
Drain Power Points: (3 PP) R8" Drains 1d6+1 PP (Raise 1d8+2) (Spirit neg, +2 if types differ)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R16" Self performs minor elemental manipulation for 3 rd
Entangle: (2 PP) R8" Impedes target (Raise binds) (Agility neg, Agility or Strength ends)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr
Farsight: (3 PP) RTouch Target halves range penalties (Raise dbl range increments) for 3 rd
Fear: (2 PP) R16" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg)
Fly: (3 PP) RTouch Target gains ability to fly at normal walking Pace for 5 rd
Greater Healing: (10 PP) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2 wounds) w/out time limit or removes poison, disease, or sickness
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R8" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 3 rd
Havoc: (2 PP) R16" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius 2d6" (Strength neg)
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr
Intangibility: (5 PP) RTouch Target becomes unaffected by physical world for 3 rd (Spirit neg)
Invisibility: (5 PP) RSelf Target becomes invisible, foes -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 3 rd
Light/Obscure: (2 PP) R8" Creates 3" radius bright light for 30 min or darkness for 3 rd
Mind Reading: (3 PP) R8" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg)
Pummel: (2 PP) R9" Cone pushes creatures 2d6" (Strength neg)
Puppet: (3 PP) R8" Target obeys self for 3 rd (Spirit neg)
Quickness: (4 PP) RTouch Target gains second action for 3 rd (Raise also redraw Action Cards below 8)
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf Transforms into animal form for 1 min
Slow: (1 PP) R16" Target move counts as action (Raise also redraw Action Cards above 10) for 3 rd (Spirit neg)
Slumber: (2 PP) R16" Target sleeps for 1 min (Spirit neg)
Smite: (2 PP) R8" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 3 rd
Speak Language: (1 PP) RTouch Target speaks unknown language for 10 min
Speed: (1 PP) RTouch Target dbl Pace (Raise also Run as free action) for 3 rd
Stun: (2 PP) R12" Target Shaken (Vigor neg)
Succor: (1 PP) RTouch Removes 1 level of fatigue (Raise 2 levels) and Shaken
Summon Ally: (3+ PP) R8" Creates obedient servant for 3 rd
Telekinesis: (5 PP) R8" Moves 60 lb item (Raise 300 lb) remotely for 3 rd
Teleport: (3+ PP) RSelf Teleports PPx10" (Raise PPx15")
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R8" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 3 rd
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) RTouch Target gains combat edge effects for 3 rd
Zombie: (3 PP) R8" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr (Raise 1d6 hr, 2 until destroyed)
